de.sogomn.engine.util

Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sogomn.engine.util.SpriteSheet

  • public final class SpriteSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to manage sprite sheets.
    Author:
    Sogomn

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SpriteSheet.Orientation
      Holds the different orientations for the SpriteSheet class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a SpriteSheet object from the given image and the sprite dimensions.
      SpriteSheet(java.lang.String path, int spriteWidth, int spriteHeight)
      Constructs a SpriteSheet object from the given path (classpath!)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int index)
      Returns the sprite at the given index and left to right orientation.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int x, int y)
      Returns the sprite at the given row (y) and column (x).
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int index, SpriteSheet.Orientation orientation)
      Returns the sprite at the given index.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] getSprites()
      Returns all sprites this sprite sheet holds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                   int spriteWidth,
                   int spriteHeight)
        Constructs a SpriteSheet object from the given image and the sprite dimensions.
        Parameters:
        image - The base image
        spriteWidth - The width of every sprite
        spriteHeight - The height of every sprite

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(java.lang.String path,
                   int spriteWidth,
                   int spriteHeight)
        Constructs a SpriteSheet object from the given path (classpath!) and sprite dimensions.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the base image
        spriteWidth - The width of every sprite
        spriteHeight - The height of every sprite

    • Method Detail

      • getSprite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int x,
                                              int y)
        Returns the sprite at the given row (y) and column (x).
        Parameters:
        x - The x index (column)
        y - The y index (row)
        Returns:
        The sprite as a BufferedImage or null if the indices are wrong

      • getSprite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int index,
                                              SpriteSheet.Orientation orientation)
        Returns the sprite at the given index. The orientation might either be left to right or top to bottom.
        Parameters:
        index - The index
        orientation - The orientation (left to right or top to bottom)
        Returns:
        The sprite as a BufferedImage or null if the index is wrong

      • getSprite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int index)
        Returns the sprite at the given index and left to right orientation.
        Parameters:
        index - The index
        Returns:
        The sprite as a BufferedImage or null if the index is wrong

      • getSprites

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] getSprites()
        Returns all sprites this sprite sheet holds.
        Returns:
        The sprites as an array
